content.textfile:
This is version 1.2.6 of BNUDM, a replacement sersetup.exe file (the DOOM serial driver) for DOOM.
It replaces bnudm125, which had a minor bug in it.

review.text: Great serial driver for direct connections. The biggest gripes are that it's not a drop-in replacement for sersetup.exe so know your parameters and that it will only look for doom.exe, so you should make a batch script for heretic and other games to make a copy /y heretic.exe doom.exe.
